msbt.message: Ohmigosh! Today is the Fishing Tourney!
I totes wish the Fishing Tourney would start already! I CANNOT wait to start catching fish!
The Fishing Tourney starts at 9 AM! Oh, , we are both SO going to catch all the fish!
The Fishing Tourney has started! Time to separate the posers from the fisherfolk!
I'm going to fish, and fish, and fish! There's an item I want, so I've got to nab a fish fab enough to earn it!
! I decided to take a day off from planning to be a pop star andcatch some fish!
Today was AMAAAAAAZING! With all the fish I caught, it totally feels like it was worth the effort!
I wonder when the next tourney will be? Whenever it is, I can't wait!
Hey, ! Do you know of any pop-star fishing pros? I might just be the first!
Know that feeling when you sit back and are all, "I caught sooooo many fish today"? <10_4 />It's the best feeling!
If I feel a, like, personal connection with a fish? I usually just take it home to live with me!
I tried to think like a fish Like, "Bwoop, bwoop"—those are the bubbles—"I'm a fish." "I breathe water." But it hasn't helped. I'm not catching ANYTHING
I see a fish swimming in the water, and I realize I would look WAY GLAM in a shiny mermaid costume!It'd be hard to walk in that tail, but fashion is worth the trouble!
Any luck with the fish so far?<10_4 /> I can feel it. Luck is on my side today, . Just you wait and see. Those fishies will be jumping into my arms in no time!

I think folks would totes be into seeing their fave pop star doing something awesome like fishing. Like, if I do this Fishing Tourney right, I could catch fish AND catch some new fans at the same time I know! I could call itSTAR fishing!
Catching cute little fish is way fun. But catching big fish is MAXIMUM exciting! Too bad I'm not having luck catching either! I'd totes settle for ANY size of fish right now, .

How's the fishing going? Are you getting, like, super serious about it?I've been pretty chill about it so far, but I'm going to break out my A game here soon. "A" is for AWESOME, of course. You and the fish have been warned, !
It may sound weird, but going fishing in the winter helps keep me warm, . See, every time a fish gets away, my blood BOILS! They get away A LOT, so I'm nice and toasty!
No matter how many times I tell myself, ", you snooze, you LOSE"This spring weather still tempts me to doze off when I should be fishing.Sometimes it just feels like, "You snooze, you WIN," right?
Sunscreen, check! Water, check! Extreme pop-star confidence, triple check!Trust me, with this kind of prep, I can wait ALL day for those fishies to bite, .

Just a little tip Today is, like, the perfect day to take a pic of your fave enjoying some fishing! First of all, I look super cute in this fall light. Second of all, I look très sporty with this fishing pole. So, maybe take some pics. Share them with my fans if you want. I totes give you permission.
Sunscreen, check! Water, check! Extreme pop-star confidence, triple check!Trust me, with this kind of prep, I can wait ALL day for those fishies to bite, .

No matter how many times I tell myself, ", you snooze, you LOSE"This spring weather still tempts me to doze off when I should be fishing.Sometimes it just feels like, "You snooze, you WIN," right?
